The more I grow the more they hate; the more they hate the more I grow.
Behind every successful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
I don’t have time, energy, or interest in hating the haters; I’m too busy loving the lovers.
I wish all my haters a long life, so they can see me succeed in my way.
Only God can judge me not haters and somebody loves too.
Haters are my favorite. I´ve built an empire with the bricks they´ve thrown at me. Keep on hating.
The hated man is the result of his hater’s pride rather than his hater’s conscience.
I don’t worry about the haters… They are just angry because the truth I speak contradicts the lie they live.
You are proof that evolution CAN go in reverse.
I know that rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
I wasn’t born with enough middle fingers to let you know how I feel about you.
Haters don’t hate you. They hate themselves because you’re a reflection of what they wish to be.
I never doubt myself, that’s my haters 24/7 job.
I treat my haters like FM radio, I just don’t listen to them.
Jealousy is a terrible disease…Get well soon!
Haters keep on hating, cause somebody’s gotta do it.
If you don’t like me, why do you waste your time making fun of me?
I refuse to have a battle of wits… with someone who is unarmed.
Being hated isn’t easy, you know. You just cannot falter meeting their expectations.
And these haters try to knock me but they can’t knock me off the hinges.
I never try to win over the haters because I’m not a jackass whisperer.
Your birth certificate is an apology letter from the condom factory.
I only feel sorry for weak people. And mostly what I’ve come to find is that the weak people are the ones that are the haters.
Is your ass jealous of the amount of shit that just came out of your mouth?
If I wanted to kill myself, I would climb up your ego and jump down to your IQ level.
I don’t chase after anyone, If you wanna walk out of my life, then I’ll hold the fucking door open for you.
I deal with haters on a daily basis.
The haters always scream the loudest.
Oh, I love critics. Because they love me. It’s not a joke. They care.
I’m sure there are some haters out there, but I just put my blinders on.
Roses are red, violets are blue, I have 5 fingers, the 3rd ones for you.
I don’t care what the haters and naysayers say. If they make jokes about me, I’ll laugh because they’ll probably be funny.
Bitch you’re like Monday, nobody likes you.
I try not to read the negative comments, and when I do, I let it roll off my back. I remind myself that there will always be haters.
Sometimes I just want to thank my haters cause they are my unpaid motivators.
Support bacteria – they’re the only culture some people have.
From the moment I first saw you, I knew I wanted to spend the rest of my life avoiding you.
When guys get jealous it can be kinda cute. When girls get jealous World War III is about to start.
Respect your haters they’re the only ones who think you’re better than them.
To all the haters out there I wish you the best. You can’t bring me down. I wake up every day grateful.
